page.title: 04EDUCATION.
page.content:
{KNOSSINGTON & OWSTON SCHOOLS { ____________________________ All children in Owston have to go elsewhere to school;the Leicester Education Authority provides a minibus to take the younger children to Knossington Primary school, and a coach comes via the village to take older childern to the Vale Of Catmose Village College or Sixth Form College in Oakham. Some parents opt for private education and take their children to schools in Oakham and Leicester. Two young people go away to University.
The Grange school in Knossington caters for childern with speical Eductional needs. It offers boarding facilities for boys who are selected and paid for by local education authorities all over the country.
